channel.title: India News on TechnoStreet
channel.description: Recent content in India News on TechnoStreet

item.title: Uttar Pradesh Policeman slaps man seeking probe on father’s death, video viral | WATCH
item.description: Uttar Pradesh Policeman slaps man seeking probe on father’s death, video viral | WATCH The man, after being slapped, can be seen collapsing to the ground as someone from behind asks the policeman why he is turning to violence.

item.title: 14 coaches of Suryanagari Express derail in Rajasthan, 24 passengers injured, 12 trains diverted
item.description: 14 coaches of Suryanagari Express derail in Rajasthan, 24 passengers injured, 12 trains diverted The Suryanagari Super-fast train derailed near Bomadda village of Pali district in Rajasthan at around 3:30 am on Monday morning.

item.title: Maharashtra : School bus falls into gorge in Raigad, 7 including children injured
item.description: Maharashtra : School bus falls into gorge in Raigad, 7 including children injured The police squad arrived at the scene as soon as the tragedy was reported, and with the assistance of locals, they transported the injured to the hospital.

item.title: Ban Drishti IAS: Coaching teacher’s take on Lord Rama and Sita offends people, leaves Twitter divided
item.description: Ban Drishti IAS: Coaching teacher’s take on Lord Rama and Sita offends people, leaves Twitter divided Drishti IAS is a civil services coaching centre in New Delhi that provided guidance to prepare exams conducted by UPSC.
